nodes.text: The Planetary Trade Director was an elected official whose job it was to ensure fair trade for people on the planet Rhamalai. When the Galactic Empire occupied the planet in 0 ABY, Planetary Trade Director Markren Pellias tried to stand up for his people, who were being forcibly conscripted to serve the Empire, but Imperial General Yrros told him that the people were being adequately compensated.
